    • Method Detail

      • addVisibleChild

        void addVisibleChild(java.lang.String path)
        Add new visible child to the context.
        Parameters:
        path - Full name of the context to add as visible child of the current one.

      • removeVisibleChild

        void removeVisibleChild(java.lang.String path)
        Remove visible child from the context.
        Parameters:
        path - Full name of the visible child to remove.

      • hasVisibleChild

        boolean hasVisibleChild(java.lang.String path)
        Returns true if the context has a visible child with specified path.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to check.

      • getDefaultValue

        DataTable getDefaultValue(VariableDefinition vd)
        Returns default value of the variable. If it's not directly specified in the variable definition, an empty data table in the variable's format is created and returned.
        Parameters:
        vd - Definition of the variable those default value to return
        Returns:
        Default value of the variable

      • removeVariableValue

        void removeVariableValue(java.lang.String name)
        Permanently deletes variable value from the database. This method should be used only before variable definition is going to be removed from the context.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of variable those value should be removed.
